q2_dataset_response: {"answer": "The lesion presents with a nodular appearance and a color ranging from skin-toned to pinkish-red. There are some darker brown or black specks visible on the surface. Fine hairs are present in the surrounding skin, and a measurement scale is visible on the side."}
